testcase.name: test_login_success

failure.message: AssertionError: No access_token in response assert 'access_token' in {'token': 'eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJ1c2VyX2lkIjoiYjUzMDIzZDMtYWFhNi00MDkxLTlmYWUtZTk3ZWY1ODUyYTJkIiwiZXhwIjoxNzY4MTY0Mjc5fQ.ax0utiI3xqtlJEoSNmuuLzqj8SMWiIfAYGu67y8HSiw', 'user': {'email': 'admin@adhesiveflow.com', 'id': 'b53023d3-aaa6-4091-9fae-e97ef5852a2d', 'name': 'System Administrator', 'role': 'admin'}}

testcase.failure: tests/test_inventory_procurement.py:36: in test_login_success assert "access_token" in data, "No access_token in response" E AssertionError: No access_token in response E assert 'access_token' in {'token': 'eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJ1c2VyX2lkIjoiYjUzMDIzZDMtYWFhNi00MDkxLTlmYWUtZTk3ZWY1ODUyYTJkIiwiZXhwIjoxNzY4MTY0Mjc5fQ.ax0utiI3xqtlJEoSNmuuLzqj8SMWiIfAYGu67y8HSiw', 'user': {'email': 'admin@adhesiveflow.com', 'id': 'b53023d3-aaa6-4091-9fae-e97ef5852a2d', 'name': 'System Administrator', 'role': 'admin'}}
